name: Evil Game Company
description:
Welcome to Evil Game Company,  a Meta Game Jam Entry, where you have to handle the decisions of an evil game company to raise your stock, all while trying to keep the community happy.

Try your harder and win! Good luck!

@brian.dalmeida - Music / Sounds - https://brian321.itch.io/ - https://www.linkedin.com/in/badalmeida/
@FevGames - Game Design - https://fevgames.net/ - https://fevgames.itch.io/
@Roby65 - Programming - https://roby65.itch.io/
@SheepishGames - Art / Graphics - https://sheepishgames.itch.io/
